short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension containing some handy tools for the CodinGame website

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tools:
- Turn the page into a chat only tab, nothing else.
- Remove the chat entirely and fill out the rest of the space with the current page.
